name: Broken Sword 5 - The Serpent's Curse: Episode II
name_original: Broken Sword 5 - The Serpent's Curse: Episode II
description:
Paris in the spring. Shots ring out from a gallery.
A deadly conspiracy, and the conclusion to a classic, thrilling, Broken Sword adventure.
From multi-award winning Revolution Software comes the concluding explosive episode in this classic series.
Playing as intrepid American George Stobbart and sassy French journalist Nico Collard, you find yourself on the trail of a stolen painting - and a murderous conspiracy.  A conspiracy whose roots lie in mysteries older than the written word...
1 player(s)
4096KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
